Posts.Content: Aloha, I would get a second and even a third opinion if you are not comfortable with your doctor's explanation. Maybe the second or third doctor would be willing to authorize a biopsy. Even if the masses are not cancer, there are several other breast diseases. Whatever is going on should be diagnosed and treated. Good luck and good health to you !! Peace, Elaine http://langetc.tripod.com/health11.html (Breast Cancer Resources website)

Posts.Title: Scared and Confused

Posts.Content: Hi, The Her 2 support website the other person recommended it a very good one. I have been taking Herceptin, Navelbine and Arimidex which seem to be working very well for me. Hang in there. Peace, Elaine http://langetc.tripod.com/health11.html (link to some breast cancer resources)
Posts.Title: Herceptin and Her-2pos Breast Cancer

Posts.Content: Hi Norma, Thanks for your message. I am doing fine with Herceptin, Navelbine and Arimidex. I hope you are still doing fine with the Herceptin and Arimidex. Take care. Peace, Elaine http://langetc.tripod.com/health11.html
